exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: 10-15 push-ups. Keep your body straight and lower yourself until your chest nearly touches the floor.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: 30 jumping jacks. Jump while spreading your legs and raising your arms overhead.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: 15-20 squats. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body as if sitting back into a chair.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold plank position for 30-60 seconds. Keep your body straight from head to toe.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: 20 mountain climbers. Start in plank position and alternately bring knees to chest quickly.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: 10 lunges per leg. Step forward and lower your body until both knees are at 90 degrees.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: 5-10 burpees. From standing, drop to squat, jump back to plank, do a push-up, jump feet back to squat, then jump up.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.description: Hold wall sit for 30-45 seconds. Lean against wall with thighs parallel to floor.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: 30 seconds of high knees. Run in place while lifting knees as high as possible.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: 10-15 tricep dips using a chair or bench. Lower your body by bending your arms.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: 15-20 crunches. Lie on your back and lift your shoulders off the ground.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: 10-15 leg raises. Lie on your back and lift your legs up to 90 degrees.
